name: @neevaco/xyzapi
description: SDK and Typescript type definitions for nxyz API
author: Joshua Davis <joshua@n.xyz>

scripts.build: mv .npmrc package.json ./../../ && rm -R ./* && openapi-generator generate -i https://api.n.xyz/api.json --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,typescriptThreePlus=true -g typescript  -o /tmp/typescript && cp -R /tmp/typescript/* ./ && rm -R /tmp/typescript/* && mv -f ./../../.npmrc ./../../package.json ./ && npm install && tsc
